mapper.select: select t_check_factory_cycle.factory_cycle_id, t_check_factory_cycle.factory_cycle_name, t_check_factory_cycle.create_dt from t_check_factory_cycle
mapper.update: update t_supplier_files set file_status = #{file_status}, auth_dt = #{auth_dt} where record_id = #{record_id}

update t_supplier_files set is_delete = #{isDelete} where supplier_id in
#{item}
mapper.insert: insert into t_supplier_files ( company_id, record_id, supplier_cpyname, source_type, file_status ) values ( #{company_id}, #{record_id}, #{supplier_cpyname}, #{source_type}, #{file_status} )
mapper.select: select * from t_supplier_files where supplier_id IN (select supplier_id from t_supplier_owner_info where company_id=#{owner_id}) and company_id=#{company_id} and file_status=0 limit 1

SELECT taac.id, taac.category_id, taac.record_id, taac.create_dt, tpc.category_name, tpc.f_id, tpc.purchase_nature_id FROM t_access_application_category taac LEFT JOIN t_purchase_category tpc on taac.category_id = tpc.category_id WHERE taac.record_id = #{recordId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_supplier_files SET no_check = 1, no_checkor_id = #{noCheckorId}, no_checkor = #{noCheckor}, no_check_dt = NOW() WHERE supplier_id in
#{item}

UPDATE t_supplier_files SET no_check = 0 WHERE supplier_id in
#{item}
mapper.select: select * from t_supplier_files where supplier_id IN (select supplier_id from t_supplier_owner_info where company_id=#{pur_company_id}) and file_status=0 order by auth_dt desc limit 3
mapper.update: update t_supplier_files set is_auth_updated = 1 where company_id = #{company_id}
mapper.select: select supplier_id from t_supplier_files where record_id=#{record_id}

select count(*) from t_supplier_files where supplier_id IN (select supplier_id from t_supplier_regaccount_info where reg_id=(select reg_id from t_reg_accout_company_info where company_id=#{company_id} limit 1)) and supplier_cpyname=#{supplierName}

select tsf.supplier_id, tsf.record_id from t_supplier_files tsf, t_supplier_owner_info tsoi where tsf.supplier_id = tsoi.supplier_id and tsf.company_id = #{companyId} and tsoi.company_id = #{receiveCompanyId}
